Home Blog About GitHub

pwnthem0le is a Turin-based, hacking students group born out of CyberChallenge 2018. Read more about us and how to join us!

About

pwnthem0le is an hacking group and CTF team from Turin, Italy. We firstly met at CyberChallenge IT 2018, and now we organize weekly meetings on cybersecurity topics at Politecnico di Torino. We also partecipate in CTF events (see our team on CTFTime).

Active Members:

  • Francesco Bergesio (Fra96)
  • Lorenzo Bertolino (lo__be)
  • Angelo Delli Santi (XxcoralloxX)

  • Matteo Protopapa (matpro98)

  • Pietro Tirenna (madt1m)
